# fake-dom [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/danielhusar/fake-dom.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/danielhusar/fake-dom)

> Create globals for window and document in node.


## Install

```
$ npm install --save fake-dom
```


## Usage

```js
require('fake-dom');
```
